snippet: China is in the throes of the harshest anti-vice campaign in years, and the crackdown is taking a toll on the economy of Dongguan, a southern city of more than eight million people.
abstract: China is undergoing harshest anti-vice campaign that government has mounted in years, shuttering brothels and other illicit trades; crackdown is taking especially harsh toll on economy of Dongguan, city of eight million people and home to bustling red-light industry.
lead_paragraph: China is in the throes of the harshest anti-vice campaign in years, and the crackdown is taking a toll on the economy of Dongguan, a southern city of more than eight million people.

headline.main: Red Lights Dim in China’s Sin City
headline.print_headline: Lights Dim in China’s Sin City

keywords.value: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China
keywords.name: organizations
